price: 69. Waxaa loo laba laabi Cadaabka Maalin- ta Qiyaamaha, wuuna ku dhex waari isagoo dulleysan.
arabic: يُضَٰعَفۡ لَهُ ٱلۡعَذَابُ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ وَيَخۡلُدۡ فِيهِۦ مُهَانًا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yuḍāʿaf lahu al-ʿadhābu yawma al-qiyāmati wayakhlud fīhi muhānan
